meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the October 10, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, the October 24, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, and the November 7, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Development Plans
agenda_items.description: Application for a development plan on property zoned Tract 13A - MF-2(A) within Planned Development District No. 508.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: Various applications for zoning cases requiring approval.

agenda_items.title: Special Provision Sign District
agenda_items.description: Application to create a new subdistrict, Lawyers Building, within the West End Historic Sign District.

agenda_items.title: Authorized Hearings - Zoning Case
agenda_items.description: City Plan Commission authorized hearing seeking a recommendation regarding a proposal to change the zoning classification.
